item.title: Forget world peace, we need world amazing
item.description: World Peace will never work. World Amazing is the only solution to humanity's issues. We need a world where everything is amazing for everyone from the moment they begin to exist in this world. That's how to fix anything and everything.

item.title: World Piece of Pizza Day
item.description: Can humanity do anything together? Could we share a meal together as simple as pizza? Why or why not? Everyone worldwide is invited, including your mom. Next party scheduled for April 4th 2024.

item.title: Intro to Cloggy
item.description: On Xwitter you Xweet. On Threads you Thread. And on Cloggy you SHIT. Coming soon, a place where everyone can post SHIT (Special High Intensity Transmissions) to make the world amazing for all. No ads. No monthly subscriptions. No need to log in. Just SHIT.
